data.name: My Super Tower 2
data.detailed_description:
My Super Tower II is a classic Tower Defence with a minimalist 3D graphics.

Your goal is to protect your castle from the enemy waves by using different types of towers and skills.

The game is present the company with the storyline, as well as being an endless game mode - with a number of level (it is planned to add new levels in the future) and Ballance thought that is constantly being finalized.

Features:

  • Different levels of a single company
  • Different types of enemies, including a mini-boss and Boss
  • Several types of towers with the possibility of improving the protection of the fortress
  • Various skills that will assist you in the most difficult moments of the game
  • Nice Low-Poly schedule
data.about_the_game:
My Super Tower II is a classic Tower Defence with a minimalist 3D graphics.

Your goal is to protect your castle from the enemy waves by using different types of towers and skills.

The game is present the company with the storyline, as well as being an endless game mode - with a number of level (it is planned to add new levels in the future) and Ballance thought that is constantly being finalized.

Features:

  • Different types of enemies, including a mini-boss and Boss
  • Several types of towers with the possibility of improving the protection of the fortress

data.short_description: My Super Tower II is a classic Tower Defence with a minimalist 3D graphics. Protect your castle from the enemy waves by using different types of towers and skills.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9-compatible with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 1.66GHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2.0GHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9-compatible with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.2GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.66GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9-compatible with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse
